name: Keeper of the Shrine
effectText: This card can be treated as 2 Tributes for the Tribute Summon of a Dragon monster. While this card is in your hand or GY, if a face-up Dragon monster on the field, except "Keeper of the Shrine", is sent to the GY by a card effect or because it was destroyed by battle: You can Special Summon this card, then, if that monster sent to the GY is a Normal Monster, you can add 1 Dragon Normal Monster from your GY to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Keeper of the Shrine" once per turn.
